Title: Door #3
Writer: Aziz Ansari (created by), Aziz Ansari (teleplay by), Parker Hull (script coordinator), Lakshmi Sundaram (story by), Alan Yang (created by), Alan Yang (teleplay by)
Actors: Aziz Ansari, Bobby Cannavale, Kelvin Yu, Eric Wareheim
Plot: A sweet job offer forces Dev to take stock of his priorities. Brian helps his dad with a romantic dilemma. A cupcake competition judge gets cold feet.
